word: H1158 - בָּעָה - bâʻâh - baw-aw' - Cause - வழக்கு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கேள், பொங்கப் பண்ணு, தேடு, விழப்பிதுங்கு
to seek out, to swell, to cause to swell, to boil up, to enquire
2) to be swelling, to be bulging, to be swelling out
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to gush over, that is, to swell; (figuratively) to desire earnestly; by implication to ask: - cause, inquire, seek up, swell out, boil.
